entity.name: Sarah Huckabee Sanders
entity.description: White House Press Secretary Sarah Huckabee Sanders

text: @PressSec Oh Kayleigh, please spare us your crocodile tears- you'll ruin your makeup. Ask your boss if he feels any guilt having a rally during the peak of the coronavirus and not mandating the attendees to wear a mask and keep a distance of 6' apart. Never mind, Trump has no feelings.
